fxwindow.fxstage

Class FXStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • fxwindow.fxstage.FXStage

  • public class FXStage
extends java.lang.Object

    This class allows to manage stages and basic actions for them

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ivan Zhen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FXStage()
      Creates empty FXStage object.
      FXStage(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Creates FXStage object with root element of stage.
      FXStage(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root, java.lang.String url)
      Creates FXStage object with root element of stage and with url for open a new stage with it or refresh the current one.
      FXStage(java.lang.String url)
      Creates FXStage object with url for open a new stage with it or refresh the actually.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes current stage and their threads without exiting entire application.
      void open()
      Opens a new stage.
      void setContext(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Sets root elemet of stage for FXToolbar object.
      void setScene(java.lang.String url)
      Sets the scene by giving it the url to fxml archive.
      void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Sets title for the new stage.
      void setUndecorated(java.lang.Boolean b)
      Sets if the new stage will be decorated or undecorated.
      void setUrl(java.lang.String url)
      Sets the relative path to fxml archive.
      void updateScene()
      Refresh current scene.
      void updateScene(java.lang.String url)
      Refresh current scene by giving it the url to fxml archive.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FXStage

        public FXStage()
        Creates empty FXStage object.

      • FXStage

        public FXStage(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
        Creates FXStage object with root element of stage.
        Parameters:
        root - Root element of the stage as AnchorPane.

      • FXStage

        public FXStage(java.lang.String url)
        Creates FXStage object with url for open a new stage with it or refresh the actually.
        Parameters:
        url - Path to fxml archive relative to the project folder.

      • FXStage

        public FXStage(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root,
               java.lang.String url)
        Creates FXStage object with root element of stage and with url for open a new stage with it or refresh the current one.
        Parameters:
        root - Root element of the stage as AnchorPane.
        url - Path to fxml archive relative to the project folder.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        public void setContext(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
        Sets root elemet of stage for FXToolbar object.
        Parameters:
        root - Root element of the stage as AnchorPane.

      • setUrl

        public void setUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Sets the relative path to fxml archive.
        Parameters:
        url - Path to fxml archive relative to the project folder.

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets title for the new stage.
        Parameters:
        title - Title for the new stage.

      • setScene

        public void setScene(java.lang.String url)
        Sets the scene by giving it the url to fxml archive.
        Parameters:
        url - Path to fxml archive relative to the project folder.

      • setUndecorated

        public void setUndecorated(java.lang.Boolean b)
        Sets if the new stage will be decorated or undecorated.
        Parameters:
        b - True for new undecorated stage, false for new decorated stage.

      • updateScene

        public void updateScene(java.lang.String url)
        Refresh current scene by giving it the url to fxml archive.
        Parameters:
        url - Path to fxml archive relative to the project folder.

      • updateScene

        public void updateScene()
        Refresh current scene. Make sure you have set an url in your FXStage object.

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens a new stage. Make sure you have set an url in your FXStage object.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes current stage and their threads without exiting entire application.
